name: Rootpath Purifier
oracle_text: Lands you control and land cards in your library are basic.

Whenever another nontoken Soldier you contorl dies, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.

name: Thopter Mechanic

name: Perilous Vault

name: Calamity's Wake
oracle_text:
Exile all graveyards. Players can't cast noncreature spells this turn.
Exile Calamity's Wake.
flavor_text:
The sylex's blast had razed the land, leaving behind old snow and sorrow.
Urza stood alone in the sudden silence.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "One down, several thousand more to go."

flavor_text: Anyone can destroy a continent. Few have the vision to rebuild one.

First Strike

name: Mox Amber
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control.
flavor_text:

—*The Discoveries of Feldon*

name: Quicksilver Amulet
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

oracle_text: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
